snippet: Pablo Larrazabal broke the course record at Kennemer Golf & Country Club in the Netherlands to take the lead at the halfway stage of the KLM Open at 10 under.
abstract: Pablo Larrazabal of Spain breaks course record at Kennemer Golf & Country Club in the Netherlands, taking second-round lead at the KLM Open.
lead_paragraph: Pablo Larrazabal broke the course record at Kennemer Golf & Country Club in the Netherlands to take the lead at the halfway stage of the KLM Open at 10 under.
